Subject: New Recruits

Content-Length: 544
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Yanshosh@...

::FZ::

FZ taps a few keys on the console, looking through various data. He 
was kinda bored, but didn't show it on the outside. Suddenly, the orb 
on his left hand sparks up, sending a jolt of pain through him.

-Go to the room I've marked in Zardus's mind and activate the new 
recruits. They'll be useful.- Was all the voice says inside FZ's hand 
before the orb quieted down and returned to being a clear blue stone.

Knowing better than to not obey, FZ stands up, checking Zardus's mind 
and walking toward the room with the new recruits.
